settings.title: ROCHE MUSIQUE, WHO ARE WE ?
settings.text:
Roche Musique is an independent French music label founded in 2012 that distinguishes itself through it’s unique blend of electronic, néo-soul, hip-hop, funk & more hybrid sounds.
Embracing a diverse roster of talented artists such as : FKJ, Dabeull, Darius, Kartell, Zimmer, Cézaire, Didi Han, Wayne Snow, Lossapardo .. the label is renowned for it’s dynamic releases , unique lifestyle and electrifying events that resonate with music enthusiasts worldwide.
As a trendsetter in the music industry, Roche Musique seamlessly blends contemporary styles with a distinct touch from the 80’s-90’s era, creating an immersive audio-visual experience.
Dive into the world of Roche Musique and explore a realm where music transcends boundaries and ignites the senses.

Spread the Groove.

To know more about the label artists & releases : www.roche-musique.com
